WRITING.TITLE: What is the video where the guy gives the girl a valentines day card (or similar) then breaks up with her and knocks it out of her hands?
WRITING.TEXT: I dont know if this is the right subreddit, point me in the right direction if I'm wrong but thanks for the help regardless! I've searched and searched and cannot find it.
Wow, this is actually real in USA? W-w-w-w-whaaattttt... To me it seems like a Harry Potter exhibit but it's a story and exhibit for in denial grown ups..
